ARABIC: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Their reckoning is the concern of my Lord alone if you were but aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is for my Lord to bring them to book, if you can understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is only for my Lord to take account of them. Would that you made use of your understanding!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If only you would realize, their account is with my Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed their account is only upon my Lord, if you perceive.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Their account is only with my Lord, if you could (but) know."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Their account is only with my Lord, if you could perceive
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Their account falls only upon my Lord, were you but aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! their reckoning is my Lord's concern, if ye but knew;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My Lord alone can bring them to account, if only you could understand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Their reckoning is upon my Lord, if ye but knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Their reckoning is only with my Lord, should you be aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Their account is only with my Lord, if ye could (but) understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Their account is only with my Lord, if you could (but) know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Their account falls only upon My Lord, if you were but aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Their account rests only with my Lord, if you have sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:113] Their reckoning is only my Lord’s concern, and He will requite them, if only you were aware — had you known this, you would not have reviled them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! their reckoning) their reward and sustenance (is my Lord's concern, if ye but knew) this;
